title: BLACK+DECKER Crisp 'N Bake™ 6-Slice Digital Air Fry Toaster Oven
description: Breakfast, lunch, & dinner just got easier with the BLACK+DECKER Crisp ‘N Bake 6-Slice Digital Air Fry Toaster Oven! Sit down to a delicious, evenly cooked meal 2X faster* thanks to 5 Heating Elements utilizing calrod and quartz technology. And with the versatility and convenience of 8 Digital Cooking Functions, cooking meals for you and the family has never been easier. Start your day with perfectly cooked toast or bagels for everyone. For lunch or dinner, you can set it to bake your favorite pizza, and for easy weeknight family meals, air fry delicious meals with no need to add extra calories from adding extra oil. AirFry Technology surrounds food with high intensity hot air to crisp your favorite fried foods with little to no oil so you can enjoy that deep fried taste without the fat. Simply select a preset or use the Digital Controls to set and adjust the shade, time, & temperature for precision cooking. And with dishwasher-safe accessories, cleaning up is a breeze!
